title: LoL on Mac doesn't work
body:
Hi everyone,

 Im currently facing a technique difficulty when playing LoL on my iMac. The problem is when I download the file and run it, it apprears only the Logo of LoL for 2-3 minutes and automatically closes, then nothing happens. It keep repeating many times, and I dont know what to do.  
Here is the image of my screen: http://i.imgur.com/rUMcLVj.jpg

replies.body:
Hey there,

From that image it looks like you're not running league correctly, see below for correct instructions on how to install league on mac.

**INSTALLING LEAGUE OF LEGENDS**

* After downloading the installer from our website, locate the .dmg file in your Downloads folder.  (In this example, we've downloaded the NA Mac Client)

https://support.riotgames.com/attachments/token/CPbhDrMqhhrXdFsrijKwUnQSM/?name=mac+screenshot.jpg

* Double click on the .dmg and you will see the following window appear

https://support.riotgames.com/attachments/token/h2owpzobufoquvu/?name=Screen+Shot+2013-08-20+at+7.03.29+PM.png

* Drag and drop League of Legends.app to the Applications folder. **Do not** run League of Legends.app from this window.

https://support.riotgames.com/attachments/token/0oeztr6mqqs0igs/?name=macinstall.png

* Close the .dmg window
* Navigate to your Applications folder, and then run League of Legends (Note: Do not drag and drop League of Legends to the Dashboard). The patcher will appear.
